code:
var BASE_URL="http://localhost:3000";// const BASE_URL = "http://localhost:3000";
export var register=function register(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(response){if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Error al registrarse: ".concat(response.status));}return response.json();}).then(function(res){return res;}).catch(function(err){throw new Error("Error en la solicitud de registro: ".concat(err.message));});};export var authorize=function authorize(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(credentials){if(credentials.token){localStorage.setItem("token",credentials.token);return credentials;}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};export var checkToken=function checkToken(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:"GET",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};
